name: Bumper Kart.io: Crash and Bomb
description:
Hit your opponent out of the arena. Then you will become bigger and stronger.
When you are last one on the arena, you will win.
Come on! Become the player with the most wins on the world leaderboard.

Game Features:
- Beautiful scene design
- Various roles for play
- Special props Bomb and Nitro
- Simple and Smooth control
